content:
I saw this yesterday and just now. I'm not sure why it's happening but restarting Docker seems to fix it:

[ERROR] DOCKER> I/O Error [Unable to start container id [99031a6de676] : {"message":"error while creating mount source path '/Users/pdurbin/github/iqss/dataverse/docker-dev-volumes/postgresql/data': mkdir /Users/pdurbin/github/iqss/dataverse/docker-dev-volumes: file exists"} (Internal Server Error: 500)]
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
